details.personal: Hi, My name is Navdeep Mishra
details.work: I possess over 2 years of professional experience in frontend technologies.
details.study: Graduated in Bachelor in computer applications
details.interested: Interested in Frontend Development | Full stack development | AI/ML
details.funFact: Trying to be a little better than yesterday every day

data.title: Frontend Software Engineer
data.description: Working as Frontend Software Engineer and building web apps end to end using latest frontend technologies.

data.title: Associate
data.description: Worked as associate at HCL Technologies.

data.title: Bachelor of Computer Applications - (BCA)
data.description: Completed my graduation from Amrapali Group of Institute. Aff. Kumaun University

data.title: Sr. Secondary & Secondary Education
data.description: Completed my Sr. Secondary and Secondary schooling from Maharishi Vidya Mandir. Aff. CBSE

data.title: Fast Pannel
data.description: Participated in Dev - Mongo DB hackathon and won the runner up position. It built using Preact & MUI. It brings an admin pannel similar to Django for Fast API

data.title: Portfolio 2.0
data.description: My second portfolio website created using ReactJs & MUI.

data.title: Portfolio 3.0
data.description: My third portfolio website created using NextJs, Tailwind CSS, Emotion. Also Thanks for visiting my Portfolio 3.0

data.title: BrainWars
data.description: Participated in Appwrite x Hashnode hackathon. Created an online multiplayer game using the NextJs,MUI and Appwrite.

data.title: NewsHut
data.description: Created a personalized news website using Django/Django Rest and Postgress, Mastered my core frontend skills like HTML, CSS & JS. No use of any library or framework.

data.title: KeepSafe
data.description: Created the personal password and notes locker powered by Django. Used core Html,Css & JS for frontend. Encrypted the user passwords  and notes data in the db

data.title: DFit
data.description: A platform for connecting doctors and patient. Very similar to an EMR. Created using Django, Django Rest Framework, Postgress. Frontend build using core Html, Css and JS. Working on V2 with NextJS.
